name: translate-everything
promptContent:
CAMELCASE TRANSLATION
Names can be translated word by word. You can split up the camelCase or PascalCase statement name into an array of words before translating every individual word (e.g. `englishWordsArray` becomes ["english","words","array"], which in turn becomes ["engels","woorden","lijst"] which then becomes `engelsWoordenLijst` in dutch.

Please translate this typescript file into Dutch:

- Comments and string literals can be translated directly
- Apply camelCase translation on function names, variable names, destructured variable names, object properties
- reserved typescript words should be translated
- translate anything else as well
- be creative

```
%context
```
